name: SRA Consulting
membership: Kammer der Architekten und Ingenieurkonsulenten für Wien, Niederösterreich und Burgenland (http://wien.arching.at)
goal:
SRA Consulting is a one-stop shop for science and regulations.

Our main activities are in the areas of

- food safety, science and technology
- risk analysis
- nutrition
- national, European and international food law
- innovation anagement
- sustainability

We advise national and international companies, federations, government organisations and NGOs.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
Food and feed legislation

Other related legislation, including medicinal products, medical devices, cosmetics

Food and Nutrition Policy, including obesity and malnutrition

Risk analysis

Food safety

Public health
